biotools.summary: IDDRRA is a software that allows the user to design and model a DNA molecule, irradiate it with various types of radiation included in the Geant4 physics models, and then analyze the simulation outcome in terms of Single Strand Breaks (SSB), Double Strand Breaks (DSB), Cluster Damage Sites (CDS) and energy deposition. IDDRRA, combines powerful tools in a single platform, providing the ability to quantify DNA damage and DNA damage repair using MC forecast algorithms.
